column3: Traffic Alert Due to Water Main Repair:
column4: W Main St between N Limestone and N Upper St
column5: The right lane is blocked until further notice.  Expect delays through rush hour.

column4: Effective Tuesday 7/30 on N Martin Luther King Blvd at E Fifth St.
Traffic signals are no longer active.  Signals are in flashing red mode in all directions.
All-Way Stop signs are in place for traffic control.
